docs.lead_paragraph: Induced pluripotent stem cells appear to have the healing potential of embryonic stem cells without the controversy, but when given to mice, they didn’t survive the immune response.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a large clinical trial, patients who were treated before the virus seriously damaged their immune systems were 96 percent less likely to pass it on.
